title: Chicken enchilada nachos
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons butter, divided', '40g chopped onion', '1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 chilli pepper, seeded and chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '120ml chicken stock', '1 skinless, boneless chicken breast, cubed', '1/4 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon seasoned salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '2 tablespoons soured cream', '65g grated Cheddar with chilli', '50g tortilla chips, or to taste', '2 tablespoons pico de gallo or salsa, to taste']
